comment.author: 27109792@N00
comment._content: pretty sure this is on the east side of Yerba Buena Island, the Bay Bridge goes directly over what was the parade ground

comment.author: 14587525@N06
comment._content: I think that bldg in the bg is to the left of the old cantilever span just as it makes landfall on the E side of YB Island, as you say. Some great architecture on that base!

comment._content: Here's a Street View link showing that building from exactly the same angle - as you say, the road goes right across this view now www.google.co.uk/maps?q=Yerba+Buena+Island&ll=37.8109...
